metadata.title: CVE-2017-8294 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
libyara/re.c in the regex component in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and application crash) via a crafted rule that is mishandled in the yr_re_exec function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-8294` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyara8 - 3.7.1-1ubuntu2
yara - 3.7.1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yara package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-1ubuntu2').
